sentences.en: After a botched heist, Eddie (Bruce Willis), a murderous crime boss, hunts down the seductive thief Karen (Claire Forlani) who failed him.
sentences.cn: 一个拙劣的抢劫后，埃迪（布鲁斯·威利斯），一个凶残的黑帮老大，查获诱人的小偷卡伦（克莱尔·弗兰妮）谁辜负了他。

sentences.en: After this conversation the journal entry for The Great Neverwinter Heist will be updated.
sentences.cn: 在这交谈之后日志条录将被更新.

sentences.en: Angelina plays Gloria, a young girl whose brother was killed in the heist-gone-wrong.
sentences.cn: 安吉丽娜饰演格罗瑞亚，她的哥哥在那次抢劫中被误杀。

sentences.en: As each minute of the heist ticks by, true motives are revealed and unexpected twists ratchet up the stakes to a thrilling crescendo.
sentences.cn: 作为抢劫的每分钟运转的，真正的动机是揭示和意想不到的曲折加大赌注一个激动人心的高潮。

sentences.en: But compared with the total annual trade in illicit goods, the heist was small change.
sentences.cn: 但是相比每年的非法商品交易总额,这些失窃的艺术品价值只是区区小数.

sentences.en: Every partner got their split of the profit after the bank heist.
sentences.cn: 他们抢银行后每人拿到一份赃款.

sentences.en: Gather the right crew: You’ll need the right partners in crime to pull the heist.
sentences.cn: 召集合适的搭档： 你将需要一些合适的正在犯罪的搭档去抢劫。

sentences.en: He also faces charges in Boston for the alleged TJX heist.
sentences.cn: 他在波士顿还面临涉嫌参与TJX案的指控.

sentences.en: It had not been much of a heist; he said his accomplice “got some change” but he got nothing.
sentences.cn: 那都说不上是一次抢劫，他说他的同谋“搞了点零钱”而他一无所获。

sentences.en: The armed robbers stole over US $ 500 million in the largest bank heist in history.
sentences.cn: 武装的强盗偷了五百多万美金,犯下了史上最大宗的银行抢案.

sentences.en: This was a 21st century bank heist that reached through the Internet to span the globe.
sentences.cn: 这是一种21世纪通过互联网遍布全球的银行抢劫。

trans.tran_cn: （对商店、银行贵重物、钱的）盗窃
trans.tran_en: A heist is a robbery, especially one in which money, jewellery, or art is stolen
